overview:
Product management leadership of telco services and telco data groups at TNS, VeriSign CSG and Illuminet. 19 years of product innovation for telecommunications data and connectivity products.

Elected chair of National Telco Forum (LIDB/CNAM group), and founder of National Verification Forum (identity data). Currently, acting co-coordinator of Open Identity Exchange (OIX) working group.

Leadership of industry forums, decade-long relationship building expertise with national telco companies, including AT&T, Verizon, T-Mobile, Qwest, VeriSign, CenturyLink, TNSI, Illuminet. Launched LIDB and Caller Name ID product lines nationwide, in partnership with other telecommunications data groups.
